What are the treatments for Age-related Macular Degeneration ?,"Wet AMD can be treated with laser surgery, photodynamic therapy, and drugs that are injected into the eye. None of these treatments is a cure for wet AMD. The disease and loss of vision may progress despite treatment.",NIHSeniorHealth,Age-related Macular Degeneration
